channel.title: Angry Pkers - Growing already - 20 players on at night times
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Hello, my name is Bob. There is a pretty new server out there, that you should really check out.
It's name is... [b]Angry Pkers[/b].[/size]
[url=http://www.angry-pkers.com/forum/index.php]http://www.angry-pkers.com/forum/index.php[/url]
[url=http://www.angry-pkers.com/play.php]http://www.angry-pkers.com/play.php[/url]
This server has tons of features, a few which will be listed in pictures. Let's list some here:
- Great PKing - Lots of bosses - Lots of donating options, some of which are cheap - Dicing for members - PvP drops (as in random items) in safe pk - We've received enough donations to last a while - Loyal players - Great staff - Daily challenges - Lottery and slots gambling system - Constant updates
Perk charge is something unique, this picture will explain it... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yv7nBlZ.png[/img]
You might be wondering about that fire icon. Those are the teleports... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tKbhpSC.png[/img]
I mentioned daily challenges right? Those should be finished by the 10th... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ic2byqA.png[/img]
Lots of bosses you ask? Well they all have unique drops. Here's one... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LhVwaAS.png[/img]
Let's promote a little gambling? Dice bags baby... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/58dP70h.png[/img]
So come check it out, you won't be disappointed. Yours truly, [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CkS0cy5.png[/img]

[size=12pt]Hello, my name is Bob. There is a pretty new server out there, that you should really check out.

  • We’ve received enough donations to last a while

You might be wondering about that fire icon. Those are the teleports…

I mentioned daily challenges right? Those should be finished by the 10th…

Lots of bosses you ask? Well they all have unique drops. Here’s one…

Let’s promote a little gambling? Dice bags baby…

So come check it out, you won’t be disappointed.
Yours truly,
